title: West Virginia Derailment Raises Concerns About Volatility Of Bakken Oil
teaser: NPR's Melissa Block speaks with Wall Street Journal reporter Russell Gold about the volatility of crude oil from the Bakken shale formation in North Dakota. That's the same oil that exploded when a train derailed in West Virginia two weeks ago.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
